PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2020-08022020-10-09GAC,  ,  ,  , 
ActExport and Import Permits Act
SubjectOrder Amending the Automatic Firearms Country Control List
PrecisOrder amending the AUTOMATIC FIREARMS COUNTRY CONTROL LIST (AFCCL) in order to 1) add Austria, Ireland, Japan and Switzerland to the AFCCL; and (2) allow Canadians who own one of the 1500 models and variants of firearms that were reclassified as prohibited on May 1, 2020, additional options to dispose of them through export to their original manufacturers.
AttachmentsAttachment
